document.full_text: more than 36 hours after al qaeda chief osama bin laden was killed in a u.s. raid in pakistan, the afghan taliban who once sheltered him, finally reacted by questioning whether he was actually dead.
document.title: taliban delay on bin laden death speaks of agenda
lines_and_colors: more than 36 hours after al qaeda chief osama bin laden was killed in a u.s. raid in pakistan, the afghan taliban who once sheltered him, finally reacted by questioning whether he was actually dead.
